content.raw:
"currently +/- 1 in Gazebo", I suppose you mean Gazebo enforces the magnitude of integral term to be  <=1.
When I tested inside Gazebo, it allows me to set any value <-1 or >1, I am not sure whether we are enforcing this limit from back end. If this is the case, let's report a bug for the GUI display, since it is displaying invalid numbers
